articles.title: Ramesh Nair appointed CEO for Collier’s India business - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: As Managing Director, Market Development, Asia, Ramesh Nair will use his considerable industry experience to add value beyond the boundaries of India and develop services, expand client relationships, and attract other talented professionals to the company.
articles.content: You heard it on Moneycontrol first. Leading diversified professional services and investment management company Colliers, on July 21, announced the appointment of Ramesh Nair as the Chief Executive O… [+2010 chars]
